welcome: Welcome to use barotrauma override checker!
localmod: If you want to check local mods in your modlist, please enter 'f' to select your localmod path.
choose:
Choose an option:
1. Select modlist.xml
2. Select a mod folder
Type 'f' to select localmod path
Type 'q' to quit
Enter your choice (1/2/f/q):
invalid: Invalid choice. Please choose either 1 or 2.
